create table account
(
	phonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	firstname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	surname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	password VARCHAR(500) not null,
	role VARCHAR(50)
)


create table booking
(
	userfullname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	userphonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	pickuplocation VARCHAR(50) not null,
	dropofflocation VARCHAR(50) not null,
	orderfood VARCHAR(50) not null,
	cost VARCHAR(50) not null,
	vehicle VARCHAR(50) not null,
	bookingid VARCHAR(50) not null,
	driverfullname VARCHAR(50),
	drivernumber VARCHAR(50)
)


create table driver
(
	phonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	vehicletype VARCHAR(50) not null,
	time VARCHAR(50) not null,
	firstname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	middlename VARCHAR(50) not null,
	lastname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	age VARCHAR(50) not null,
	sex VARCHAR(50) not null,
	emailaddress VARCHAR(50) not null,
	address VARCHAR(50) not null,
	barangay VARCHAR(50) not null,
	ssidnumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	licensetype VARCHAR(50) not null,
	licensenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	licenseexpiredate VARCHAR(50) not null
)


create table feedback
(
	fullname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	phonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	message VARCHAR(50) not null
)


create table foodorder
(
	foodname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	orderamount VARCHAR(50) not null,
	totalcost VARCHAR(50) not null,
	userfullname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	userphonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	bookingid VARCHAR(50) not null,
	variant VARCHAR(50) not null,
	merchantfullname VARCHAR(50),
	merchantnumber VARCHAR(50),
	driverfullname VARCHAR(50),
	drivernumber VARCHAR(50)
)


create table merchant
(
	phonenumber VARCHAR(50) not null,
	firstname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	middlename VARCHAR(50) not null,
	lastname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	businessname VARCHAR(50) not null,
	businessaddress VARCHAR(50) not null,
	businesspermit VARCHAR(50) not null
)
